verbose_text: Selective COX-2 inhibitors with PPIs and selective COX-2 inhibitors alone decreased the relative risk of PUB by 16% (adjusted OR 0.84, 95% CI : 0.62-1.13) and by 15% (adjusted OR 0.85, 95% CI : 0.67-1.06), respectively, compared with conventional NSAIDs.
evidence: COX-2 inhibitors alone decreased the relative risk of PUB
